insert into ${item.dbmsTable} (${item.columns}) values (${item.sql})
;
insert into ptobjecttable (obid, pclass_name,pflags) values
(#{item.obid}, #{item.className}, #{item.flags})
;
insert into ptrelationtable (obid, pclass_name,pfrom_class,pfrom_obid,pto_class,pto_obid) values
(#{item.obid}, #{item.className}, #{item.fromClass},#{item.fromObid},#{item.toClass},#{item.toObid})

;

(#{item.obid}, #{item.className}, #{item.flags})
;
insert into ptkeytable (obid, pclass_name,pnames,prevision) values
( #{item.obid}, #{item.className}, #{item.names},#{item.revision})

insert into ${item.dbmsTable} (${item.columns}) values (${item.sql})
;
insert into ptobjecttable (obid, pclass_name,pflags) values
(#{item.obid}, #{item.className}, #{item.flags})
;

( #{item.obid}, #{item.className}, #{item.names},'-')
mapper.select:
select a.obid as obid, a.pclass_name as class_name, a.pflags as flags from ptobjecttable a where a.obid in
#{item}
select pclass_name as class_name ,pflags as flags ,obid as obid from ptobjecttable where obid = #{obid}

select obid, pclass_name class_name, pflags flags from ptobjecttable where obid in
#{item}
mapper.insert: select a.obid as obid,b.pflags as flags,a.pclass_name as class_name,a.pfrom_obid as from_obid,a.pto_class as to_class,a.pto_obid as to_obid, 1 as is_to from ptrelationtable a, ptobjecttable b where a.pfrom_obid = #{obid} and a.obid = b.obid union all select a.obid as obid,b.pflags as flags,a.pclass_name as class_name,a.pfrom_obid as from_obid,a.pto_class as to_class,a.pto_obid as to_obid, 0 as is_to from ptrelationtable a, ptobjecttable b where a.pto_obid = #{obid} and a.obid = b.obid
